text: iseula-el baegseong-ege yagsog-eul hasa hananim oeeneun eotteon geosdo gyeongbaehaji malmyeo bumowa chincheog-ege goawa bul-uhan jadeul-ege jaseon eul bepulgo salam-egen gyeomsonhamyeo ye baeleul deuligo inseullamseleul bachila haessgeoneul neohuijung sosuleul je-oehagoneun-oemyeonhamyeo deung-eul dollidoda
